snippet: A new mosque that has faced arson, vandalism and a court battle has passed inspection and will be allowed to open by Friday, in time for the final week of Ramadan, its leaders said Tuesday.
abstract: New mosque in Murfreesboro, Tenn, that has faced arson, vandalism and a court battle passes inspection and will be allowed to open in time for the final week of Ramadan.
lead_paragraph: A new mosque that has faced arson, vandalism and a court battle has passed inspection and will be allowed to open by Friday, in time for the final week of Ramadan, its leaders said Tuesday.

headline.main: Tennessee: Mosque Is Expected To Open This Week
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Mosque Is Expected To Open This Week
